featured.text: The baby panda Yuan Zai at the Taipei Zoo was separated from her mother because of a minor injury that occurred during her birth.

definition.zh_def: 元：中國的貨幣單位，通常用於表示金錢的數量。
definition.en_def: Yuan: The basic unit of currency in China, often used to denote amounts of money.
definition.example: I exchanged my dollars for yuan before my trip to China.
